title: Content screening
content:
Overview

  • Screening is a basic check and may not cover other issues or subtle ones
  • It is to weed out bad content from quality ones.
  • By default, new Topic, Argument, Issue, Question, Answer will have a status of pending screening
  • All content will all types of status will still be displayed, except the priority in ranking will differ. A  status icon will also be displayed to indicate the status of an entry.
  • Certain restrictions may also apply based on status


Screening status

  1. Pending screening - the default status.
  2. Screened - has passed the basic check for content quality. Initial issues may have beed raised at this point
  3. Rejected - very low quality content, major violations, spamming or trolling
